WCLParser module

class WCLParser.WCLParser(client: WCLApiConnector)[source]

Bases: Parser

Parse(url: str, query: str)[source]

This functions sends a request to the WCLApiConnector

Parameters:

  • url – full URL of the request

  • query – This is what we want to request from WCL

Returns:

It returns the response from the WCL API for the query we gave it

ParseEvent(log_code: str, data_type: str, fight_id: str)[source]

This is the function where we parse the event (encounter) data from the WClApiConnector.RequestEvent. This function includes the data from the wipes (unlike ranking)

Parameters:

  • log_code – the code of the log we want the API to read

  • data_type – type of the event we want to scrape,

https://www.warcraftlogs.com/v2-api-docs/warcraft/eventdatatype.doc.html <- for future possibility to expand the cog methods :param fight_id: the fight encounters we want to analyze the data from :return: a pandas dataframe containing the event data obtained from WCLApiConnector.RequestEvent

ParseFight(log_code: str)[source]

This is the function where we parse the fight data from the WClApiConnector.RequestFight

Parameters:

log_code – the code of the log we want the API to read

Returns:

a pandas dataframe containing the information obtained from a WClApiConnector.RequestFight

ParseGuild(guild_name: str, serv_name: str, server_reg: str)[source]

This is the function where we parse the guild data from the WClApiConnector.RequestGuild

Parameters:

  • guild_name – name of the guild whose members we want to check

  • serv_name – name of the server of the guild

  • server_reg – region of the guild server

Returns:

a pandas dataframe containing the information obtained from a WClApiConnector.RequestGuild

ParsePlayers(log_code: str, fight_id: str)[source]

This is the function where we parse the player details data from the WClApiConnector.RequestPlayers

Parameters:

log_code – the code of the log we want the API to read

:param fight_id:the fight encounters we want to analyze the data from :return: a pandas dataframe containing the player details data obtained from WCLApiConnector.RequestPlayers

ParseRanking(log_code: str, rank_type: str)[source]

This is the function where we parse the ranking data from the WClApiConnector.RequestRanking

Parameters:

  • log_code – the code of the log we want the API to read

  • rank_type – the type of ranking which we want to compare hps/dps

Returns:

a pandas dataframe containing the information obtained from a WClApiConnector.RequestRanking

client = None
